Title: Tiger & Bunny: Too Many Cooks Spoil the Broth.
Description: ['The official website for the ', Tiger & Bunny, " anime announced on Friday that the Pacifico Yokohama's National Convention Hall of Yokohama is hosting special ", Tiger & Bunny, ' concerts with a new short anime on September 19 and 20. The franchise's composer Yoshihiro Ike is personally conducting the "Sternbild Orchestra & Band" for live performances of music from the television series and two films.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
